channel.title: Xaji: Project One | Development Paused
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/nSwQv.png[/img] [size=8pt]Project One[/size][/center]
Hello there, my name is Luke Kurumu and though just previously lurking on RSPS community forums since Feb '11. Now I've decided with my gained knowledge on Java to start my own project up.
This isn't entirely going to be an emulated version of RuneScape, but instead an improvised adventure multiplayer RPG. [size=8pt]Will be in Java.[/size]
[b]Base:[/b] Hyperion.
[b]The core features will be:[/b] Client & cache revision 317, Ruby scripting integration, Multiple world support, Update server, MySQL, Secured verification system (including use of advanced cryptography),
[b]Update log:[/b] [code]#20/12/11#Gathering resources - Doing graphical aspects & gameframe #21/12/11#Previous base (Delta) was scrapped and am starting with Hyperion. Still working on gameframe and some other graphical aspects.[/code]
[b]Media:[/b] No media until 25/12/11

item.title: Xaji: Project One | Development Paused
item.dc:creator: @Kurumu Kurumu
item.description:
@Kurumu wrote:

Thanks for the supportive comments people.

Loveandpower:

This needs more information

Not going to make up stories so I can have a bigger thread.
Will update my progress soon. Then there will be more information.

Media will be added to the thread in a few days.

Read full topic

item.title: Xaji: Project One | Development Paused
item.dc:creator: @Kurumu Kurumu
item.description:
@Kurumu wrote:

[center]
[size=8pt]Project One[/size][/center]

Hello there, my name is Luke Kurumu and though just previously lurking on RSPS community forums since Feb '11. Now I’ve decided with my gained knowledge on Java to start my own project up.

This isn’t entirely going to be an emulated version of RuneScape, but instead an improvised adventure multiplayer RPG.
[size=8pt]Will be in Java.[/size]

Base:
Hyperion.

The core features will be:
Client & cache revision 317,
Ruby scripting integration,
Multiple world support,
Update server,
MySQL,
Secured verification system (including use of advanced cryptography),

Update log:

#20/12/11#Gathering resources - Doing graphical aspects & gameframe #21/12/11#Previous base (Delta) was scrapped and am starting with Hyperion. Still working on gameframe and some other graphical aspects.

Media:
No media until 25/12/11
